metadata.title: CVE-2022-21699 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: IPython (Interactive Python) is a command shell for interactive computing in multiple programming languages, originally developed for the Python programming language. Affected versions are subject to an arbitrary code execution vulnerability achieved by not properly managing cross user temporary files. This vulnerability allows one user to run code as another on the same machine. All users are advised to upgrade.

criterions.comment: ipython package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
